channel.title: Can someone create Storage 'Gauge'
channel.description: I am looking for a way to determine level of storage I can tell at a glance and some distance. Ideas: * A guage on side of storage that shows content status, like a fuel gauge in an automobile * light on the storage, like a production object: Green Full, Yellow half, Red empty, White Filling up (or activity) Maybe this is difficult to do, otherwise it would be done already. note: I know I can choose disassemble to see the recovery, which also shows content, but I have to inspect each one.

item.title: Can someone create Storage 'Gauge'
item.dc:creator: @Caldeiradas Caldeiradas
item.description:
@Caldeiradas wrote:

You have that with the MoarFactory, the silo is a 3 entrance, 3 exits and with a side bar so you can see how full it is.
It has 100 item slots and ocupes 4 foundations

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone create Storage 'Gauge'
item.dc:creator: @rcamarda390 Rcamarda390
item.description:
@rcamarda390 wrote:

I am looking for a way to determine level of storage I can tell at a glance and some distance.
Ideas:

  • A guage on side of storage that shows content status, like a fuel gauge in an automobile
  • light on the storage, like a production object: Green Full, Yellow half, Red empty, White Filling up (or activity)
    Maybe this is difficult to do, otherwise it would be done already.
    note: I know I can choose disassemble to see the recovery, which also shows content, but I have to inspect each one.

Read full topic
